alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 6:47PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT GILA COUNTY THROUGH 715 PM MST... At 647 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cow Pasture Butte, or 31 miles southwest of Show Low, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Silver Butte, Cow Pasture Butte, Cedar Creek, Blue Rock Butte, Bull Butte, Cibeque Peak, and Fort Apache Reservation. This includes the following highways... State Route 73 between mile markers 318 and 324. Highway 60 between mile markers 301 and 312. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
